author: PTI
title: Coronavirus | New York registers daily deaths under 550 for first time in almost two weeks
description: New York City, the epicentre of coronavirus outbreak in the US, has 122,148 confirmed virus cases.
content: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo said the state appears to be past the plateau on the coronavirus infection curve and is starting to descend , as hospitalizations continue to decline and the daily death toll dropped under 550 for the first time in almost two we… [+1857 chars]
